metadata.Title: CVE-2016-6298 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: The _Rsa15 class in the RSA 1.5 algorithm implementation in jwa.py injwcrypto before 0.3.2 lacks the Random Filling protection mechanism, whichmakes it easier for remote attackers to obtain cleartext data via a MillionMessage Attack (MMA).

criterions.comment: python-jwcrypto: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
